overview: Vera is a beautiful young woman who can’t get a job in any way, because beauty only disturbs her, because at every new job she receives indecent offers from her boss. Vera’s girlfriend, Katya, who works in the theater, makes Vera “ugly” with the help of makeup. And then luck is smiling at the girl, she settles in a rich house, a nanny for a little boy.
title: Suddenly the magician will arrive
